summary: This document is a list of exhibits for Chapter 6 of an Office of the Inspector General (OIG) report, detailing materials related to the investigation into the custody, care, and supervision of Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. The exhibits include interview transcripts, FBI reports, Bureau of Prisons memoranda, and evidence logs concerning surveillance video analysis and seized items.

events.title: FBI Property Receipt
events.description: FBI Receipt for Property Received, Returned, Released, Seized for several Items.

events.title: Seizure of DVR Systems
events.description: FBI seizure of DVR System #2 and later DVR Controller and DVR System #1 from MCC New York.

events.title: BOP Response to OIG Draft Report
events.description: Bureau of Prisons provides its formal response to the OIG's draft report on the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's custody at MCC New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, New York (MCC New York)
Special Housing Unit, MCC New York
keyFacts: The document is an exhibit list for Chapter 6 of an OIG investigation (Case 2019-010614) focused on the BOP's custody of Jeffrey Epstein at MCC New York.
Multiple exhibits pertain to the analysis of surveillance video from the MCC New York Special Housing Unit, where Epstein was held.
FBI evidence logs document the seizure of DVR systems and a controller from the MCC on August 15, 2019, following Epstein's death.
The list includes a BOP response to the OIG draft report dated June 22, 2023, indicating the investigation's timeline.
Several interview transcripts and FBI 302s are listed, but the names of the interviewees are not provided in this index.
